pages.text: $(mind)There exists a base for materials that far outshines any other. The remnant material from setting Astral against the universal corrupter, Curse: $(item)Creation Salts$(0)$(mind). It will appear about a quarter of the time. Watch as aspects of reality flash on its surface, then fade away...
$(mind)It can also be created as an item with a simple transmutation.
$(mind)Of course, its block and item forms are interchangeable.
$(mind)This base yields 16 material blocks for each input, and it doubles the effectiveness of the Powers used.$(p)At such extreme concentrations, new Properties may assert themselves.
